\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Idea is to use a dijkstra algorithm with weights being BW, but ignoring the link if there is already a pending transfer Problem is it may add significant latency The higher the rank, the lower the performance

Retrieve the source to use for a data transfer to \textquotesingle{}dst\textquotesingle{} where the valid sources are amongst the \textquotesingle{}valid\textquotesingle{} bitfield

\doxysubsection{Member Data Documentation}
\mbox{\Hypertarget{classRouterCFS_a57afc95e36e05e9182d4c0dd995f2303}\label{classRouterCFS_a57afc95e36e05e9182d4c0dd995f2303}} 
\index{RouterCFS@{RouterCFS}!map@{map}}
\index{map@{map}!RouterCFS@{RouterCFS}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{map}{map}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily const \mbox{\hyperlink{structRouterCFS_1_1xkrt__router__cfs__map__t}{xkrt\+\_\+router\+\_\+cfs\+\_\+map\+\_\+t}} Router\+CFS\+::map}

A graph where weights\mbox{[}i\mbox{]}\mbox{[}j\mbox{]} is the weight of the edge between node \textquotesingle{}i\textquotesingle{} and \textquotesingle{}j\textquotesingle{} If weights\mbox{[}i\mbox{]}\mbox{[}j\mbox{]} is UINT8\+\_\+\+MAX, then there is no edge If weights\mbox{[}i\mbox{]}\mbox{[}j\mbox{]} = weights\mbox{[}i\textquotesingle{}\mbox{]}\mbox{[}j\textquotesingle{}\mbox{]} / x then the bw on link (i,j) is \textquotesingle{}x\textquotesingle{} times greater than the bw of link (i,j) -\/ i.\+e. the lower weights\mbox{[}i\mbox{]}\mbox{[}j\mbox{]} the greater the BW If used\mbox{[}i\mbox{]}\mbox{[}j\mbox{]}, then a communication is already occuring on link (i,j)
